hook:
WE JUST MERGED 40 PULL REQUESTS IN ONE WEEK.

Here is what happens when you stop talking and start shipping.
body:
The era of single-modality AI apps is over. Developers need a unified interface for text, audio, video, and agents. This week, we built it.

We significantly expanded the Pollinations platform to support the full creative spectrum:

1. THE COMPLETE AUDIO SUITE
We integrated OVH Whisper for speech-to-text, upgraded to ElevenLabs v3 for high-fidelity speech, and added the ElevenMusic model. You can now build apps that listen, speak, and compose music via a single API.

2. VIDEO & IMAGE RENAISSANCE
We added support for LTX-2, Imagen-4, Flux-2-dev, and Grok-video. Whether you need hyper-realistic generation or stylized video, the models are live and ready for inference.

3. AGENTS TAKING ROOT
We open-sourced our Polly Discord Bot and integrated OpenClaw. This isn't just about generating contentâ€”it's about autonomous agents that can act on it.

4. FRICTIONLESS DEV EXPERIENCE
We merged our Docs directly into the Play page and redesigned the frontend. The distance between 'reading the docs' and 'shipping your first call' is now zero.

WHY THIS MATTERS
We are not just wrapping models. We are building the open, permissionless infrastructure for the next generation of AI creativity. No gatekeeping. No subscriptions. Just code.

Is your team moving this fast?
cta: Check out the new models at pollinations.ai
